en_source:
MoU Signed to Support Orphans, Widows, and Disabled Individuals in Afghanistan
KABUL (BNA): The Ministry of Martyrs and Disabled has signed a significant Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Humanitarian Human Rights Development (HHRD) Organization, committing over five million Afghanis to aid orphans, widows, and individuals with disabilities across several provinces.

کابل ۲۶ جدی باختر
شهیدلر و معلوللر ایشلری وزیرلیگی یېتیملر، بېوه لر و معلوللر اوچون قولیلیکلر یره تیش مقصدیده اچ اچ آر دی خیریه مؤسسه سی بیلن بېش میلیوندن آرتیق افغانی انگلشوو بیتمی امضاله دی.

en_source: "This (solar) year, 122 accidents occurred on Balkh-Jowzjan and Balkh-Samangan highways, as a result of which 108 people died and 160 others were injured," said Qayum.

en_source: Everyone deserves a chance for recovery and hope."

en_source:
Deputy PM Kabir Stresses Respect and Facilities for Afghan Refugees in Talks with Consul General
KABUL (BNA): The Deputy Prime Minister for Political Affairs, Mawlawi Abdul Kabir, in a meeting with the Afghan Consul General in Karachi, urged neighboring countries to treat Afghan refugees respectfully and provide them with necessary facilities.

en_source:
Afghanistan and Italy Collaborate on Housing Projects to Improve Bamyan Living Conditions
KABUL (BNA): Sheikh Hamdullah Noomani, Acting Minister of Urban Development and Housing, met with Dr. Mariela Loda, President of the University of Florence, Italy, at his office to discuss the urban living conditions of Bamyan residents.

شهرسازلیک و اوی-جای قوریش سرپرست وزیری ایتالیا نینگ فلورانس بیلیم یورت باشلیغی بیلن اوچره شدی
کابل ۹ جوزا باختر

KOBUL (Janubiy jabha) – Islom Amirligi Bosh vazirining maʼmuriy oʻrinbosari Abdul Salam Hanafiy Afgʻonistonda milliy xavfsizlikni taʼminlash, iqtisodiy barqarorlikni mustahkamlash, fuqarolarga zarur qulayliklar yaratish Islom Amirligining majburiyatlari ekanini va bu borada ular bor kuch-gʻayratlarini ayamasligini taʼkidladi.

en_source: UNAMA said that on this Day, the United Nations in Afghanistan asks the ruling authorities of this country to end the restrictions against women and girls, "otherwise there is a risk of pushing the country towards more poverty and isolation."

en_source: Also, investing in light infrastructure, developing small and medium industries, supporting the agriculture, horticulture, and livestock sectors to increase domestic production, and technical and professional training are among the short-term goals of this ministry to create job opportunities and gradually reduce the level of poverty."

en_source: "I repeat my call on Pakistan to avoid yet another crisis for Afghans by canceling their plans for mass deportations to Afghanistan," wrote Richard Bennett.

en_source: According to his statements, the two sides held constructive discussions on strengthening bilateral relations, simplifying the visa issuance process for Afghan citizens, and other mutual topics of interest.

en_source:
Afghanistan to Vaccinate 11.6 Million Children Against Polio
The organization, Polio‐Free Afghanistan, says that 11.6 million children will be vaccinated during the country's latest polio immunisation campaign.

Afg'onistonda 11,6 million bola poliomielitga qarshi emlanadi

en_source: The Acting Foreign Minister of Afghanistan praised Syria's declaration of general amnesty and its constructive governance approach, expressing hope that Afghanistan and Syria could establish strong and structured diplomatic relations.

en_source:
Save the Children: Returning Migrants from Pakistan to Afghanistan at Risk of Serious Diseases
Save the Children has declared that thousands of migrants who have recently returned from Pakistan to Afghanistan are at risk of contracting serious diseases, including diarrhea.
uz_south_source:
باله لرنی حمایه قیلیش تشکیلاتی: افغانستان گه قَیتگن مهاجرلر جدّي کسللیکلرگه چلینیش خوفی آستیده
۸صبح، کابل: باله لرنی حمایه قیلیش تشکیلاتی سۉنگی هفته لرده پاکستان دن افغانستان گه قَیتگن مینگلب مهاجرلر اېچکیتمه کبی جدّي کسللیکلرگه چه لینیش خوفی بارلیگینی معلوم قیلدی.
uz_north_synthetic_ref:
Save the Children: Pokistondan Afg‘onistonga qaytgan muhojirlar og‘ir kasalliklar xavfi ostida
Save the Children tashkiloti yaqinda Pokistondan Afg‘onistonga qaytgan minglab muhojirlar og‘ir kasalliklar, jumladan diareya bilan kasallanish xavfi borligini e‘lon qildi.

en_source: Acceptance of submissiveness, conformity, avoidance of criticism, and acknowledgment of the superiority of knowledgeable and capable patriarchal figures are integral to the collective thought system in such societies.

en_source: He added: "In the future, we plan to distribute honey bee boxes and also conduct educational programs so that the level of awareness and knowledge of beekeepers increases and they can maintain their beekeeping in such conditions."

The CEO of Da Afghan Breshna Sherkat (DABS) and the Governor of Parwan met to discuss the expansion of power networks in the Barikab Industrial Park and the extension of the power transmission line.

en_source: Speeding, lack of awareness and non-observance of traffic rules by drivers, narrowness of roads, and lack of traffic signs on highways are the main factors of traffic incidents.

en_source:
Mahsa Amini Wins European Union Human Rights Award
Mahsa Amini, the young Iranian woman who tragically lost her life last year after being detained by Iran's morality police in Tehran, has posthumously been honored with the prestigious European Union Human Rights Award.

en_source:
Deputy PM Kabir Visits Iranian Embassy in Kabul, Extends Condolences for Late President Ebrahim Raisi
KABUL (BNA): Mawlavi Abdul Kabir, Deputy Prime Minister for Political Affairs of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, visited the Iranian embassy in Kabul to offer condolences on the passing of the President of Iran and his accompanying delegation.

کابل ۳ جوزا باختر
افغانستان اسلام امیرلیگی، باش وزیر اداره سی نینگ سیاسی اورین باسری مولوی عبدالکبیر ایران جمهور رئیسی و اونگه همراهلیک قیلگن هیئت نینگ وفاتی مناسبتی بیلن قیغوداشلیک بیلدیریش اوچون کابلده گی ایران ایلچیخانه سیگه باردی.

en_source: During the republic regime, when the price of the dollar increased by even one Afghani, the price of goods in the market would simultaneously increase by several percent.

en_source: Dr. Hojatullah Mohammadi, Head of Panjshir Public Health, reported to Bakhtar News Agency that The MOVE Welfare Organization has supplied these medicines and medical equipment to Panjshir's health centers for the second quarter of 2024.

en_source: Since the Islamic Emirate's return to power, both Iran and Russia have continued their economic and diplomatic relations with Afghanistan, entrusting the Afghan embassies in their countries to representatives of the Islamic Emirate.

en_source:

Taliban have also exhibited "Magnetic Mines and Yellow Barrels" at the three-day exhibition of Afghan domestic products in the city of Charikar, Parwan Province.

طالبان پروان ده اوچ کون لیک ایچکی محصولات کورگزمه سیده "سریق بشکه" نی نمایش گه قویگنلر

BADAKHSHAN (BNA): The Badakhshan Education Department has inaugurated a Teachers' Loan Fund aimed at providing financial assistance to teachers facing various challenges.

en_source: Annalena Baerbock, Germany's Foreign Minister, commented on the visit to Damascus and the meetings with officials from Syria's interim government, stating, "We must not miss the opportunity to support the Syrian people at this critical juncture."
uz_south_source: جرمنی تشقی ایشلر وزیری آنالنا باربوک دَمشققه سفری و سوريه مؤقت حکومتی رسميلری بیلن اوچره شووی حقیده: "بیز سوريه خلقینی اوشبو مهم وقتده قۉللب-قوّتلش امکانیتینی قۉلدن بای بېرمسلیگیمیز کېره ک دیب ایتدی."

en_source: Fardin, another street food seller in Kabul city, said that although the price of raw materials has increased, but he has around 200 customers a day.

en_source: In this process, nine companies were declared winners by offering their good offers.

en_source: The EU emphasized that since 2021, it has provided more than 860 million euros in aid to Afghanistan.

en_source:
UNICEF to Build 165 Schools Across Afghanistan
The United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF) in Afghanistan has announced that it is in the process of constructing 165 schools for boys and girls across the country.

یونیسف افغانستان ده ۱۶۵ مکتب قوره دی
۸صبح، کابل: بیرلشگن ملتلر تشکیلاتی نینگ افغانستان ده گی باله لرنی حمایت اېتووچی صندوغی (یونیسف) حاضرده مملکت بۉیلب اوغیسللر وقیزلراوچون ۱۶۵ مکتب قوره یاتگنینی ایتگن.

en_source: The statement noted: "These essential supplies will address urgent health needs in more than 2,400 supported health facilities across 34 provinces."

en_source:
China Accepts Official Ambassador of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan
KABUL (BNA): Bilal Karimi arrived in Beijing, on November 24, 2023, and was received and welcomed by diplomats of the Embassy of IEA in China and Yue Xiaoyong, the Special Representative of the Ministry of Foreign of Affairs of China for Afghanistan accompanying a delegation.
uz_south_source:
چین - افغانستان اسلام امیرلیگی نینگ رسمی ایلچیسینی قبول قیلدی
کابل، ۱۰ قوس، باختر
مولوی اسد الله (بلال کریمی) ۲۰۲۳ - ییل ۲۴ - نوامبر کونی چین پایتختی بیجینگه باردی و افغانستان نینگ چینده گی ایلچیخانه سی ایلچیسی، دیپلوماتلر و خادملری بیلن بیرگه چین خلق جمهوریتی نینگ افغانستان بوییچه وکیللری بیلن اوچره شدی.

Xitoy Afg‘oniston Islom Amirligining rasmiy elchisini qabul qildi
KABUL (BNA): Bilol Karimi 2023-yil 24-noyabr kuni Pekinga yetib keldi va uni IEAning Xitoydagi elchixonasi diplomatlari va delegatsiyaga hamrohlik qilayotgan Xitoy Tashqi ishlar vazirligining Afg‘oniston bo‘yicha maxsus vakili Yue Xiaoyong qabul qildi va kutib oldi.

en_source: The Taliban, in their latest media directive, have banned any critical political discussions in Afghanistan's media.

en_source: He added that the border guards at the Taybad border crossing successfully repatriated 60,380 Afghans who were present in Iran illegally through the Dogharoun border crossing in the past month.

en_source: On the other hand, Naseer Ahmad Faiq the chargé d'affaires of Afghanistan's Permanent Mission to the United Nations, in his speech referring to widespread human rights violations by the Taliban, said that women and girls in Afghanistan are "enduring gender apartheid."
uz_south_source: باشقه تاماندن بیرلشگن ملتلر تشکیلاتیده گی افغانستان نینگ دایمی نماینده سی سرپرستی نصیراحمد فایق، اۉزی نینگ صحبتلریده طالبلر آرقلی انسان حقوقلری کېنگ کۉلمده آیاق آستی بۉلگینیگه اشاره قیلیب، حاضرگی کونده افغانستانده خاتین قیزلر "جنسیتی آپارتاید"نی تحمل قیلماقده لر دېدی.
uz_north_synthetic_ref: Boshqa tomondan, Afg'onistonning Birlashgan Millatlar Tashkilotidagi Doimiy vakolatxonasi muvaqqat ishlar vakili Nosir Ahmad Faiq o'z nutqida Tolibon tomonidan inson huquqlarining keng miqyosda buzilishiga to'xtalib, Afg'onistondagi ayollar va qizlar "gender aparteidiga chidashayotganini" aytdi.

en_source: Separately, based on the statements of the local authorities of Nimroz, the bodies of 470 Afghan refugees from Iran have been transported to this province in the past eleven months.

en_source: According to him, with the continued influx of migrants from Pakistan, challenges related to accessing water and adequate health facilities, especially for families and girls, will escalate.

en_source:
Trailblazing Afghan Olympian Rohullah Nikpa Selected as Coach for New Zealand's Taekwondo Team
Rohullah Nikpa, Afghanistan's inaugural Olympic medalist, has been chosen by the New Zealand Taekwondo Federation to coach the national taekwondo team.

en_source: Since regaining control of Afghanistan, the Taliban have barred girls above the sixth grade from attending school and have also closed universities to female students.

en_source: The head of the Afghan embassy in Pakistan expresses hope that the process of arresting Afghan migrants in this country will end and that they will no longer be harassed by the Pakistani police, and that a specific mechanism will be established for their transfer to Afghanistan.
uz_south_source: پاکستان ده افغانستان ایلچی خانه سرپرستی، مذکور مملکت ده مهاجرلر نینگ قولگه آلینیش پروسه سی یکونلنیشی، پاکستان پولیسی تامانیدن اذیت بولمه سلیکی لری و شونینگدیک افغانستان گه انتقال بیریلیشلری خصوصیده بیللی حل یول تاپیلیشی گه امید بیلدیرگن.

en_source: He added that this revenue was obtained through electricity bill payments, the installation of 398 new meters, the setting up of power poles, and providing other services.

en_source: "Here (in Kabul) I am also unemployed for several days and I have to borrow from others to live my daily life."

en_source: It is worth mentioning that next week, technical committees from both sides will hold a meeting to further discuss the activities of the Norwegian Committee for Afghanistan and its development plans aimed at improving healthcare services in the country.

en_source:
House-to-House Inspection Initiated in Badakhshan Province on the Orders of Taliban's Military Command Chief
Local sources in Badakhshan report that a house-to-house inspection process has been initiated by the Taliban in the city of Faiz-Abad following a rocket attack on the residence of Qari Wasil, a commander of the Taliban in the province.

۸صبح، بدخشان: بدخشانده گی محلی منبعلرنینگ ایتیشیچه، اوشبو ولایتده گی طالبان امنیه قوماندانی قاری واصل نینگ اوییگه راکت آتیلگندن آرتیدن، بو گروه تامانیدن فیض آباد شهریده اویمه - اوی تیناو قیلیش باشلنگن.
